title: Still do not receive S6 rank bonus in TW server, plz check

embed.description: 各位板友安安：　　在親愛的板務群這兩周內用盡"請等待官方兩周內陸續配發"等理由刪鎖文後，最後的DEADLINE終於過去了！　我相信還有許多板友等獎勵等的望眼欲穿遲遲沒收到，為了避免東一串西一串的問收到沒還有無意義的開幹，

body:
15 Days. 

There are still tons of players in TW server (Garena area) wating for S6 rank bonus. 
Garena claimed that is the reason of riot, talking trash like there are so much need to gift, so you need to wait blah blah blah and they will reflect this to Riot. 
I am just a platinum player but there are players from silver to diamond are still waiting. Isn't that should be done within 2 weeks? 
And now just pop up some trash in the LOLTW website after long time waiting. Where is the promise? 
Riot, plz consider the contract to Garena next year, truly. And plz follow up this problem. 

The Link is the discuss and some sounds in a TW forum, Riot check plz. Thank you.

replies.body:
Unfortunately, we cannot assist with Garena accounts. We don't have access to their tools or their backend since Garena solely operates and supports League on their regions. Your best bet is to reach out to their player support team in a [support ticket](http://intl.garena.com/support/).

Let me know if you have any questions.
